5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Jabir that whenever the Prophet (ﷺ) ascended the pulpit he would greet (the people with Salam)

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الْخُطْبَةِ يَوْمَ الْجُمُعَةِ
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated concerning the sermon on Friday
